overview: Hey folks, hard to believe it's been 25 years since the first Rock'em Sock'em Hockey hit the stores at Christmas. Rock'em Sock'em 25 is jam packed with all the NHL action you can handle. Blue has collected all the great saves, hits, goals, bloopers and more. Of course we take a look at one of the craziest and exciting playoffs in NHL history. Blue and I just want to thank all the faithful fans who have enjoyed Rock'em Sock'em over the last quarter century. They made it the most successful Canadian video series of all time, and for that Blue and I say Thank You.
tagline: Highlights from the 2012-2013 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry.
title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 25
